translations: n.契据；不动产所有权状；防卫手段

phrs.translation: 防卫手段, 不动产所有权状, 契据, 防卫

sentences.sentence: In charge of process tooling design and arrange the review on design program. Print drawings and give the muniment room to make next process according to company regulations.
sentences.translation: 负责各工序工装的设计，组织设计方案的评审；及时按公司程序规定打印图纸并交档案室执行下发手续。
